subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The key to the resurgence by the Los Angeles Kings has been a high-power offense led by the youthful first line of Anze Kopitar centering Michael Cammalleri and Dustin Brown.
snippet: The key to the resurgence by the Los Angeles Kings has been a high-power offense led by the youthful first line of Anze Kopitar centering Michael Cammalleri and Dustin Brown.
